title: China Merchants Bank 3Q Net Profit Rose 18%
text:
By Yifan Wang

China Merchants Bank Co. (3968.HK) said its third-quarter net profit jumped 18% from a year earlier, as both interest and fee income rose.

Net profit for the third quarter was 26.63 billion yuan ($3.77 billion), compared with CNY22.62 billion in the year-ago period, the bank said.

Net interest income rose 7.0% from a year ago to CNY43.82 billion, the bank said. Its net interest margin for the quarter was 2.57%, down 0.12 percentage point from the previous quarter. The decline was mainly due to still-weak credit demand from the real economy and fierce competition for deposits, the lender said.

Net fee and commission income rose to CNY18.19 billion from CNY15.51 billion a year earlier, it said.
